attributes.action: Keep the resposible owning of reptiles alive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many animal welfare agencies which do not agree with reptile keeping. However they are giving out false information to the public and soiling the reptile keeping name. We want to keep this hobby alive, we love our reptiles like any other animal and treat them with the up most respect. Please sign this petition to keep the hobby alive and to stop false accusations ruining this for responsible keepers.
